None.Name: Infused Voidcatcher
None.Description: Activate to redirect every enemy players' power refund to Willzapper's Voidnet.The affected player's power refund will no longer flow into his void but will be gatherd in the Voidnet for 30s. In order to reobtain the redirected power enemy players must first destroy Willzapper.While the effect lasts, every friendly entity will immediately return 20% of its usual power refund into the power pool.Reusable every 60seconds.
